page.title: 11THE TIP AREA - Part 1
page.content: The Tip Area is behind Saltmarsh Drive. Often Gypsies are found there. The area is full of mud, probably because at one time Saltmarsh Drive was marshland. It runs the full length (and more) of Saltmarsh Drive. The tip finishes at Kingsweston Lane. There is a poultry farm by the side of the tip. The farm is open on Sundays for horse riding. Young people from all over Bristol come and scramble on the mud with their scrambling bikes. But soon the tip is to become a BMX racing track. Most people think the area is a disgrace, and it should have been cleared up ages ago. There is a rhine separating the two sides of the tip. The rhine contains oil, rats and rubbish. Sometimes you can even see cars and bikes. Scrap pieces of metal are often found.{cont.
